## MarkerTechniqueParams.worldOffset property

World space offset in meters applied to the icon. Valid only for icons which have the "offset\_direction" property as an attribute of the data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
worldOffset?: DynamicProperty<number>;
```
